ED_Title: Report of the Secretary-General on the work of the Organization
ED_DecisionText:
A  

At its 54th plenary meeting, on 7 February 2024, the General Assembly decided that, after the departure of the Secretary-General, his seat at the podium might be occupied by his representative.    

B

At its 55th plenary meeting, on 7 February 2024, the General Assembly took note of the report of the Secretary-General on the work of the Organization.(Footnote: A/78/1.)
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the resumed part of the session will be contained in document A/78/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
